name: UniversityNow, Inc.
description: Provider of an online education platform designed to ensure that a quality higher education is available to people everywhere. The company's educational platform provides peer-to-peer learning communities, pedagogical models and tuition models and also operates a network of online schools that provides higher education programs, enabling people to get a proper degree, who might not otherwise get a college degree, due to cost or other commitments.
one_liner: Provider of an online education platform designed to ensure that a quality higher education is available to people everywhere. The company's educational platform provides peer-to-peer learning communities, pedagogical models and tuition models and also operates a network of online schools that provides higher education programs, enabling people to get a proper degree, who might not otherwise get a college degree, due to cost or other commitments.
